author: Sébastien Roblin
title: The U.S military can do a lot to fight COVID-19. But Trump's holding it back.
description: If we mobilize the national security infrastructure in a sustained way — not the president's '15 day' magical plan — we can surely save thousands of lives.
content: The good news is that America's national security institutions have a massive capacity to help the country fight its latest war, the one on the deadly and highly contagious COVID-19. The bad news is that their commander-in-chief, President Donald Trump, faile… [+9066 chars]
